<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs=""
>
[Barbed Vest](/Equipment.aspx?ID=820)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 78

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Viciously sharp spiked chains wrap around this [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5) that can be used to magically harm the wearer and channel supernatural abilities without somehow tearing at the leather itself.

 The _barbed vest_ doesn't fuse to you in the usual way (see [Cursed Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=1094)). It can be removed and discarded, but 1 day after doing so, you feel driven to recollect the vest at any cost until the curse is removed with a [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250) spell.

 Anytime you activate the _barbed vest_, its chains tighten around you, dealing 1d6 [persistent piercing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). You can remove this persistent damage as normal, but only after deactivating the item's magic as a single action.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The _barbed vest_ casts [_spiritual weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=306), summoning a [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60) to fight for you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
